headline: Exxon Mobil (XOM): A Top Pick for Billionaire Ken Fisher Amid Strong Financials
summary: We recently published a list of 10 Best Stocks to Buy According to Billionaire Ken Fisher. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Exxon Mobil Corporation (NYSE:XOM) stands against other best stocks to buy according to billionaire Ken Fisher. headline: ExxonMobil Acquires FPSO Prosperity in Guyana for $1.23 Billion
summary: XOM concludes the purchase of FPSO Prosperity from SBM Offshore before the expiration of the maximum lease term of the FPSO.
